text_content.paragraph: Every so often, new functionality and lease data are added to CHK Search to enhance its current capabilities and to help you to be more efficient and productive as you search for company leases.

When you launch CHK Search and navigate to the Leases tab, the “What’s New - Leases” popup window displays. It lists the most recent new tab features. You will not see this popup window for the Leases tab if in the past you had clicked the “Do Not Show Again” button located at the bottom right of the “What’s New - Leases” popup window. It will reappear when new features are added.

graphic.alt: Screenshot of the Leases tab What’s New - Leases popup window.

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

cc_text.paragraph: Every so often, new functionality and lease data are added to CHK Search to enhance its current capabilities and to help you to be more efficient and productive as you search for company leases. The “What’s New - Leases” popup window lists the most recent new tab features.
